"Astarte": "You have met the requirements for your next stamp card. Here you go."
"This card involves obtaining an Advanced Class License."
"Your first objective varies, depending on class and its respective trainer."
"For Hunter, Ozha, for Rangers, Lisa, and for Force, Marlu."
"If you are a Braver, then any one will suffice."
"If you have already completed this objective, you will automatically be awarded a stamp."
